Title: My SharePoint page is loading in Teams from the browser, but not loading in the Teams desktop app
Description:
Hello All,

I have created a Teams app and added a SharePoint page as a Teams personal tab.

I have referred to the links below for the same.

[https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/article/sharepoint-site-as-static-app-in-ms-teams/](https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/article/sharepoint-site-as-static-app-in-ms-teams/)

[https://aakashbhardwaj619.github.io/2020/01/16/Add-SharePoint-Site-To-Teams-Personal-App.html](https://aakashbhardwaj619.github.io/2020/01/16/Add-SharePoint-Site-To-Teams-Personal-App.html)

My SharePoint page is loading in Teams from the browser, but not loading in the Teams desktop app.

Please refer to the screenshot below.
